product_information: Technical Details Item Weight41 g Product Dimensions1.2 x 4.5 x 3.2 cm Manufacturer recommended age:36 months - 5 years Item model number39129 Main Language(s)English Number of Puzzle Pieces1 Assembly RequiredNo Batteries Required?No Batteries Included?No    Additional Information ASINB00BP48U6Q Best Sellers Rank 4,465 in Toys & Games (See top 100) #71 in Toys & Games > Games > Educational Games #134 in Toys & Games > Electronic Toys #183 in Toys & Games > Jigsaws & Puzzles Shipping Weight41 g Delivery Destinations:Visit the Delivery Destinations Help page to see where this item can be delivered. Date First Available3 April 2013    Feedback  Would you like to update product info or give feedback on images?
product_description: Product Description Discover places and people, and collect items that belong in cities along the way. Sort recycling and trash, and match animals with their favorite food and habitat. Splash onto the scene with Gil, Molly, and the Bubble Guppies for a fun-filled learning adventure. There's a spot for you on three field trips and the gang needs your help – soaking up science and social studies subjects while boosting listening comprehension skills are all in a day's work. This innovative LeapFrog Explorer learning game features five curricular minigames, three bonus games, and three activities – every level of play is brimming with new discoveries. Works with LeapPad1, LeapPad2, Leapster Explorer, and LeapsterGS systems (sold separately). Learning skills Experience the excitement of visiting new places and meeting new people! Imagine all there is to learn when you dive into a new destination – the Bubble Guppies have new words and revelations to share with those who play along. Join Molly, Gil, Bubble Puppy, and Mr. Grouper on three exciting field trips – to Bubble City to learn about recycling, to a Dinosaur Dig to pick up fossil facts, and to the Puppy Park to discover an animal habitat. Begin to categorise animals by species and pick up fun facts related to their diets and habitats. Learn about dinosaurs, their physical characteristics, and recognise that fossils reveal secrets about ancient life forms. Finally, learn about the benefits of recycling and conserving resources. This game helps build listening comprehension skills and is appropriate for children aged 3 to 5 years old. The LeapFrog difference LeapFrog has created a learning and play environment that is developmentally appropriate for the target age group. Children interact with screen-based games in ways all their own. Game functionality has been customised to include nursery age-friendly landscape orientation and intuitive horizontal scrolling, generous 'tap and touch' hot spots to accommodate developing fine motor skills, visually compelling and distinct interactive elements, and the delivery of instantaneous feedback with any child-screen interaction. Studies have shown the benefits of integrating content area learning and literacy learning – science and social studies topics provide natural contexts for building listening comprehension skills. Innovative learning approach Children can be a part of the Bubble Guppies learning environment, discovering social studies and science topics while nurturing their natural curiosity and inquisitiveness. Along the way, children build vocabulary and listening comprehension skills key to early reading as they learn about recycling, animal habitats, fossils, and people and places in the community. Box Contains 1 x Nickelodeon Bubble Guppies game1 x Parent guide and instruction book

product_description: Rummikub is a fun strategy game . The rules are simple, the game is varied, and the fun is free for everyone! This version of Rummikub has 106 ceramic tiles with numbers in different colors and four wooden tile racks to hold the tiles during play. The object is similar to rummy card games, combining your tiles in runs (consecutive numbers in the same color) or sets (groups of the same number). The game rolls along at a fast clip, with wild-card joker tiles adding a bit of luck to the strategy needed to win. The pack contains : 106 CERAMIC TILES 4 WOODEN TILE RACKS WOODEN BOX FOR TILES

product_name: Paul Lamond Dear Zoo Dominoes
product_information: Technical Details Item Weight281 g Product Dimensions21.2 x 14.2 x 3.8 cm Manufacturer recommended age:3 years and up Item model number4585 Number of Game Players1 plus Batteries Required?No Batteries Included?No Colormulti-colored    Additional Information ASINB00MGN2X54 Customer Reviews
product_description: Product Description If the Dear Zoo storybook is a roaring success in your house, then why not give your little one a gift which stars their favourite animal characters and helps them recognise colours and numbers? The Dear Zoo Dominoes are a great game for both pre-school girls and boys aged three upwards. Cracking for Christmas and brilliant for birthdays, these bright and colourful dominoes will keep children entertained for hours whilst helping the development of hand-eye coordination, matching and organisation skills. Each of the cheerfully illustrated dominoes features characters from Rod Campbell's classic lift-flap storybook loved by children for more than three decades now. Any child who has read Dear Zoo will love the story of how a child writes to the zoo asking for a pet. A series of unsuitable pets are dispatched until the last page when the perfect pet arrives. From two swinging monkeys and six grey elephants to two lions and five slithering snakes, each domino features two sets of animals on a bold coloured background ready for pre-school matching fun. Dear Zoo Dominoes are great way to encourage your child to interact and communicate with whoever they're playing with. They'll also learn to negotiate rules, take turns and problem solves - all whilst having fun with the educational and entertaining Dear Zoo Dominoes! The perfect pet might be hard to find but the Dear Zoo Dominoes are a winning gift for game-loving pre-schoolers. Box Contains 1 x Assorted dominoe pieces

product_description: From the Manufacturer This infamous wild card and party game provides instant fun for 4 to 10 players! It's as easy as "comparing apples to apples", too, just open the box, deal the cards and you're ready to play! Select the card from your hand that you think best describes a card played by the judge. If the judge picks your card, you win that round. Don't fret, as everyone gets a chance to be the judge! Each round is filled with surprising and outrageous comparisons from a wide range of people, places, things and events. Fast moving and stimulating, Apples to Apples is perfect for any get-together with family and friends! The Party Box comes complete with 504 green and red cards; the green cards have 2 clues per card, the red cards have 1 clue per card.
